name: wifi (wlp3s0)
start_cmds: sudo ip link set wlp3s0 up
stop_cmds: sudo ip link set wlp3s0 down
status_cmds: ip --json link show wlp3s0 | jq ".[] | .flags" | grep -q '"UP"'

name: ether (enp6s0)

stop_cmds: sudo ip link set enp6s0 down
status_cmds: ip --json link show enp6s0 | jq ".[] | .flags" | grep -q '"UP"'
